name: Drudle
description:
Started to get interested with game development around 2018.
Had no idea what engine, frame work, where to publish, what, how, who?

So just took the first tutorial I could find - happens to be in Phaser and 
and started to fool around with it - Drudle was born!

After getting the main idea which is I LOVE THIS! 

moved on to learning more, getting into the artistic part as well and 
creating real games 

No matter where this will lead - Drudle will always be the first one :)
